recipe.title: The Best Café au Lait
ingredients: 4 1/2 cups freshly brewed strong coffee or espresso
Strips of orange and lemon zest
instructions: In medium pan over low heat, heat milk until bubbles form around edges. Whisk to form frothy bubbles. In insulated coffee carafe, combine coffee and milk. Serve with condiments.
